title: My Hair
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 33 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Just as in real life, each child's hair is as unique as he or she is: curly, straight, dark, or light. Students will learn the concept of diversity, new adjective vocabulary, and reinforced high-frequency words.
reviewWords: black, blond, braided, curly, hair, long, short, straight
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main ideas and supporting details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant sound /h/
grammar: Periods                : Recognize and understand the use of a period at the end of a sentence
wordWork: Antonyms                : Identify words that are antonyms
